creatures.title: Dragon
creatures.description: Legendary fire-breathing reptilian creature known in various mythologies.

creatures.title: Phoenix
creatures.description: A mystical bird that regenerates or is reborn from its ashes.

creatures.title: Mermaid
creatures.description: A sea creature with the upper body of a human and the tail of a fish.

creatures.title: Unicorn
creatures.description: A horse-like creature with a single spiraled horn on its forehead.

creatures.title: Griffin
creatures.description: A creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

creatures.title: Kraken
creatures.description: A legendary sea monster of gigantic size, often depicted as a massive squid or octopus.

creatures.title: Sphinx
creatures.description: A mythical creature with the body of a lion, the wings of a bird, and the head of a human.

creatures.title: Basilisk
creatures.description: A serpentine creature, often said to be able to kill with a single glance.
